name: Razortron 2084
description:
Razortron 2084 is a top-down racing game and the objective is very simple, race as long as you can on a procedural generated tracks, avoiding running out of gas and trying not to crash.

Features


  • Beautifull neon pixel art
  • Solid and fun gameplay
  • Original Soundtrack.

- More comming soon -

Add to your wishlist and follow to receive updates on the development.
